website_summaries.verdict: If you are a heavy sleeper, you need one of these. Period. If this won't wake you up, you're probably in a coma.
pros: Perhaps the loudest alarm clock on the planet
Comes with a bed shaker that is aptly named
Obnoxious flashing lights just in case the noise and vibrations aren't sufficient
cons: Might just scare the heck out of you
Battery backup, but alarm clock won't function if power is out

customer_reviews.title: Good vibrations
customer_reviews.text: The vibration feature works beyond my expectations. It allows my retired wife to remain sleeping when I get up at 4:00AM. Happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: fred12065

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a loud and annoying alarm id suggest you purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a loud and annoying alarm id suggest you purchase this product. It has an adjustable pitch and volume for the alarm to make sure i hate this alarm in the best way possible in the morning. Only reason for the 4 star rating is because it could use a few small improvements but ultimately its a solid product
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. Easy to set and small enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Easy to set and small enough to put in a suitcase. I bought bag with dividers to protect the clock during travel. For those times where the cable may be a little tight, I also bought an extension to minimize the risk of pulling the clock to the floor. Vibration can easily be felt when placed under the mattress. We placed it under the mattress about where the shoulders will be.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is the vibrator is not strong enough ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the vibrator is not strong enough at all. But I have a typical wake up body clock so it's ok. But if u are deaf and a deep sleeper this is not the alarm for you. There is no other option to make it stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Did not wake up my kid
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't wake up heavy sleepers. My kid did not move at all with this alarm sounding and the bed vibrating for 10 minutes. It would have no problem waking the average sleeper and its too much for a light sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Carter

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an extremely hard sleeper that was late for work several times. They haven't been late since!
customer_reviews.author: Saaja

customer_reviews.title: Best clock EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for one I bought 15 years ago. If you are a hard sleeper this is the clock you need! You dont need the bed shaker, just set it across the room, it will wake you up! Dont waste your money on other clocks if you have a hard time getting up. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can adjust the volume and the alarm ...
customer_reviews.text: The alarm clock works very well. I like that you can adjust the volume and the alarm tone.
customer_reviews.author: johnny bevins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love sonic alert alarm clock! Iam a heavy sleeper and wakes me up every morning. No over sleeping
customer_reviews.author: tracy dunn

customer_reviews.title: Clock stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working 9/9/18 so what can be done? Love that clock for travel!
customer_reviews.author: josefa

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful devise I am deaf without hearing aids and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful devise I am deaf without hearing aids and I had to travel without my husband so I need something to wake me up and this did.
customer_reviews.author: Ed & David

customer_reviews.title: This was good while it lasted about 2 weeks:/
customer_reviews.text: This was good while it lasted about 2 weeks:/. The screen just stopped working and I was stuck with the number 3 blinking. I ended up getting the below alarm and 3 months strait it has worked like champ, loud as hell, and the vibrator is strong!! I now use this -->
customer_reviews.author: Steven D

customer_reviews.title: Won’t go backwards ...to set
customer_reviews.text: Works great ....except, won’t go backwards setting Alarm ...meaning, you have to go through 24 hours if you pass your alarm time setting it.
customer_reviews.author: Vern n.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I sleep with ear plugs so I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I sleep with ear plugs so I don't get woke up by other noises, but then I can't hear the alarm clock. This takes care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Allmer

customer_reviews.title: Useless to try and sleep thru this alarm
customer_reviews.text: Honks like h'll, shakes the bed, and the shaker has a deep hum that'll annoy you too. All in all, an auditory assault that will get you up. Just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I am almost deaf
customer_reviews.text: vibration wakes me every time since I can't hear alarm with my hear aids on my dresser
customer_reviews.author: Golfman

customer_reviews.title: The snooze button is a bit small but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The snooze button is a bit small but it is very loud and the vibration even makes noise so unless taking heavy sleep meds I think just about anyone will wake off when this alarm goes off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the clock. It works well and not only vibrates but the sound is very load.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: I hate it. Its SO LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars because it absolutely works. My brother got it because he wouldn't wake up even if the world ended. However, I hate it. Its SO LOUD. It will wake up your entire household. Its what you're looking for, but you will probably hate it every morning too.
customer_reviews.author: Bida91

product_meta.title: Sonic Alert Black Travel Shaking Vibrating Alarm Clock SB200ssb
product_meta.description:
The Sonic Boom SB200ss has been designed as a cost effective travel& bedside alarm clock, with a large easy to read display and bedshaker, It also is equipped with Dual Power & Dual Time features it comes with a 110 volt power supply, will work with220 volt transformers. Clock also has two switches one allowing user toswitch from 50Hz 110 volts to 60Hz 220 volts. This feature keeps propertime with 110 or 220 volts. Another switch allows you to select 12/24hour time.
Dual power capability 110 & 220 volts & 12/24 hour time. Complete with a hi/low dimmer switch to sleep better at night. Packaged with our newest most powerful 12-volt bed shaker. Complete with a loud 113db adjustable tone & volume control. Battery backup to maintain the proper time in the event of a power outage.
feature_bullets: 113db extra-loud alarm with adjustable tone & volume control
Packaged with our most powerful 12-volt bed shaker
5-level dimmer & test function to ensure your clock is setup properly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
